body:
I tested that I can use third_party/toolchains/gpus/cuda/cuda/cuda_config.h.
For cub_archive, I found that several file is missing in Jetpack_Android_3.0/cuda-8.0/targets/aarch64-linux-androideabi/include/thrust/system/cuda/detail/cub, such as
dispatch/dispatch_reduce.cuh
tegra/external2/cub_archive/cub/device/device_segmented_radix_sort.cuhtegra/external2/cub_archive/cub/device/device_segmented_reduce.cuh.cuh
dispatch_reduce_by_key.cuh 
dispatch_scan.cuh

In conclusion, I think we need to download cub archive during compilation.
I got it by using bazel to build for Java:
./configure #choose Y for CUDA
bazel build --config opt \
  //tensorflow/java:tensorflow \
  //tensorflow/java:libtensorflow_jni

Can you point to me the url of cub archive?
